about_the_game:
What was supposed to be a simple summer break takes an unexpected twist when you find yourself trapped in a strange game where you need to fulfill challenges. Carnal challenges.




Playing as the main character, you will quickly feel the game's unsettling influence on your closest relationships, and how it is slowly, but surely, trying to corrupt your mind. Will you give in to your desires? Where does the game come from? What is its origin and motive?

You yearn to discover its secrets, but the constant sensation of being watched only adds to the intrigue.



The narrative purposefully places you in challenging situations that force a deeper introspection into your motives. As the creator of your destiny, you encounter someone manipulating you into dangerous challenges for their own entertainment. With a loved one drawn into the fray, your moral compass clashes with your lust, muddling your choices.

Once you understand that the danger might be even closer than you thought, an unexpected heroic role comes up—will you rise to the occasion and save her in time?



Every episode introduces a fresh challenge, allowing you the choice to tackle the first two. However, the subsequent challenges are non-negotiable. Your decisions are yours to make, but the consequences of not completing them remain a mystery. Prepare for a multitude of choices leading you toward diverse events and scenes.

You may not see some scenes if certain prerequisites aren't met. Proceeding without exploring all possibilities means missing out on potential adventures with the ladies. Are you willing to risk that and possibly miss out on the action?




There will be plenty of moments in which you will have to take action. Sometimes, you will not be able to do it all, so you will have to make a decision. Be mindful, as your actions wield consequences that can unlock or lock specific content in future episodes.



Carnal Contract is a visual novel game that offers you a plethora of different elements - an engaging story shrouded with mystery, the possibility to influence the MC’s love life through choices and, of course, plenty of lust.

It’s also full of sexy opportunities and action with many girls designed with attention to detail. It will be hard to decide which one you want to pursue.



To ensure an exceptional gaming experience, especially during those sexy moments, the game is designed with multiple animations that breathe life into the characters. These animations elevate your gameplay, giving you a deeper immersion within the game's world.



Oh, and did we mention that you live in a house with three beautiful women?

No? Well, you will find yourself in many situations with them where you can feel the tension and maybe even fall in love. The game's journey will confront you with diverse scenarios, stirring a conflict between your moral compass and desires.

Some moments may seem like impassable hurdles, yet there's always a chance to make it right. Your interactions with the women in your household will evolve based on your choices. Do you think you can seduce all three of them?



Each decision you make paves a unique path toward distinct endings. Certain choices hold more weight in relation to a particular love interest, potentially pulling you closer or further from them.

At times, you'll realize you can't have everything, a realization that may only surface as you approach the conclusion of the game.



Last but not least, to enhance your gameplay and occasionally refresh your memory, you can access a gallery. Here, you have the option to view sexy renders or replay entire scenes, granted you've already seen them.



A unique game feature includes the 'Sexy Mode,' which transforms some renders, offering an alternate view. Think of it like wearing special glasses; toggling this mode magically alters the girls' attire in the renders, or makes them completely nude - how cheeky, huh?





This game features adult content and some content that some users might find offensive the game might include topics that you may have a sensitivity to such as sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse.

content_descriptors.notes:
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, assault/non-consensual sex and alcohol abuse that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite 10.10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2 or WebGL
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

name: Carnal Contract

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Carnal Contract is an adult Visual Novel in which you take control of a young man who got stuck in major debts. A strange game provides a way out, but only if he dares to complete carnal challenges. The game is filled with sex, mystery, different challenges and drama.
